title: New collection of statements from IKF at the Communist!
content:
<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

Now there is a new tab on the Communist for statements from the International Communist Association. The tab can be found in the menu under statements and there you can find a collection of statements from IKF translated into Swedish. Click here to open the tab.
author: Kommunistiska Föreningens
